description: openwork design; black collar embroidered with pink flowers loosely stitched with bead bands and thread loops to separate \"petals\" of green and orange, embroidered with flowers; \"petals\" loosely attached to body with three complete and two partial white scrolls embroidered with flowers and butterflies; woven black ribbon with dragons and flowers below; loose green net-like border at bottom trimmed in multicolored thread tassels
title: Mourning or wedding cape
